name: Virtua Fighter Remix
overview: Sega Saturn's revolutionary 3D graphics power brings the arcade action home! Punch-it out with eight polygon pummeling fighters: Jacky, Sarah, Akira, Lau, Pai, Wolf, Jeffry, and Kage. Includes all 700 butt-whoopin' moves from the arcade hit. Hear every punch, smack and bone crack in CD surround sound. Dynamic replay perspectives show every knockout blow!
